ygData.subject: Re: where is it?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Go into Highpass Hold.  Avoid dying (not an easy feat).  Find the keep with the guards outside.  Go inside.  You will zone into another zone called
ygData.messageBody:
Joshua Owyang wrote:

> From: Joshua Owyang <owyanj01@...>
>
> Hey can some high level bard help me out? Where is the place where they
> sell songs in Highhold? namely the level 16 song... and where do we buy
> a song in Erudin? am I (half-elf) even allowed in Erudin? Just wondering
> for future knowledge...

Go into Highpass Hold. Avoid dying (not an easy feat). Find the keep with
the guards outside. Go inside. You will zone into another zone called
Highpass Keep. The song vendor is inside somewhere (I won't tell you exactly
where, so as not to spoil your fun). Many people don't know there is a whole
other zone in Highpass.

Be careful inside the keep to. Guards do not kill any prisoners who may be
intent on killing you.

Jyzan
